name: 这个世界真的很对劲！
description:
This Is A Game Made Of Rpg Maker Mv!

A Classic Jrpg!

Bring together people with different world views and backgrounds and meet here!
I will present a beautiful picture for you!
There are swords and magic, infinite magic, bullets and fire, all kinds of fancy things, science and technology, ancient and endless unknown things here!
Please explore together! Welcome to The World Is Really Right! 》
In this turbulent world, the vision changes suddenly, and people from all walks of life come one after another, which is called the gathering of heroes and heroes!
